messages.subject: Re: [unschoolingbasics] HI I am new here
messages.msgSnippet: chris, I m in central Oklahoma as well. There are a BUNCH of homeschoolers, and unschoolers in OKC metro area, Ok is a great state to be in if you don t want
messages.messageBody:
chris,
I'm in central Oklahoma as well. There are a BUNCH of homeschoolers,
and unschoolers in OKC metro area, Ok is a great state to be in if
you don't want to subject your kids to the PSBS. (I really like that,
whoever used it first!)

Melissa
Mom to Josh (11), Breanna (8), Emily (7), Rachel (6), Sam (4), Dan
(2), and Avari Rose

share our lives at
http://360.yahoo.com/multimomma



On May 7, 2006, at 4:13 PM, chris wrote:

> My name is Chris. Mom to 2 boys ages 6 and 3. I live in central
> Oklahoma. My oldest
> was just removed from 1st grade due to a horrific year. Where he
> learned only about
> aspects of life that hes to young for. We contemplated schooling at
> home(more of a
> un-schooling) for awhile and finally just jumped in. We don't know
> any other
> homeschooling parents around here since we do not attend a church
> ( although my
> neighbors say there are quite a bit of them at their church lol) We
> are a very
> unconventional family that loves to have fun. I hope to learn from
> you all. And hope
> to join you as we begin our new journey.
>
> chris

messages.subject: HI I am new here
messages.msgSnippet: My name is Chris. Mom to 2 boys ages 6 and 3. I live in central Oklahoma. My oldest was just removed from 1st grade due to a horrific year. Where he learned
messages.messageBody:
My name is Chris. Mom to 2 boys ages 6 and 3. I live in central Oklahoma. My oldest
was just removed from 1st grade due to a horrific year. Where he learned only about
aspects of life that hes to young for. We contemplated schooling at home(more of a
un-schooling) for awhile and finally just jumped in. We don't know any other
homeschooling parents around here since we do not attend a church( although my
neighbors say there are quite a bit of them at their church lol) We are a very
unconventional family that loves to have fun. I hope to learn from you all. And hope
to join you as we begin our new journey.

chris
